thread.title: Stoke Central’s Muslim voters warned they will go to hell if they do not vote Labour in anti-Ukip text
thread.title_full: Stoke Central’s Muslim voters warned they will go to hell if they do not vote Labour in anti-Ukip text

author: rpinnington
title: Stoke Central’s Muslim voters warned they will go to hell if they do not vote Labour in anti-Ukip text
text:
Opinion STOKING HATRED Stoke Central’s Muslim voters warned they will go to hell if they do not vote Labour in anti-Ukip text 
AN anonymous text, as well as messages posted by a party activist, brand the anti-Europe party 'racist' and the 'enemies of Islam' Exclusive By HARRY COLE, Westminster Correspondent 15th February 2017, 10:48 pm
